data.title: Contest Short With This Faultline + Flashpoint Combo
data.description: Disrupt the enemy's push with this simple combo, as it'll hit everyone in its path or divide Attackers successfully.

data.title: Hookah Reclear Aftershock + Faultline
data.description: Here's a simple, but powerful combination you can use to reclear Hookah. Attackers will be forced to take a losing fight, or give up the space.
